message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a bit steep at $20,000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I understand your position, Bob, but the value of this product is truly significant.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $17,000? I'm confident you'll see a return on this investment.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'd like to see some more flexibility from you.
